text: The Year Of The Quiet Sun may refer to: In film: *A Year of the Quiet Sun, a 1984 Polish film written and directed by Krzysztof Zanussi In literature: *The Year of the Quiet Sun, a 1970 science fiction novel by Wilson Tucker *The Year of the Quiet Sun: One Year at Scott Base, Antarctica: A Personal Impression, a 1968 nonfiction account by Adrian Hayter
title: The Year of the Quiet Sun (disambiguation)
